name: Planet Taxi (Philisophic Games)
description:
Planet Taxi is a two-player local multiplayer game played with one keyboard (or two xinput controllers). The goal is to drive your customers to their homes, but due to a shortage of customers you and your competitor will have to fight over who gets to drive them. The first to three deliveries wins. The game is set on randomly generated planets that you traverse with your trusty off-road taxi.

Controls:

P1:
Drive: WASD
Handbrake: Spacebar
Reset: R

P2:
Drive: Arrow Keys
Handbrake: alt gr
Reset: Right Shift

Toggle Music: M
